originalText.text: The worst union in the entire world. They do nothing for the people they represent . All they do is take your money. If there is minus star they did deserve that not even zero star. That union need to be closed because it is useless.

text.text: The worst union in the entire world. They do nothing for the people they represent . All they do is take your money. If there is minus star they did deserve that not even zero star. That union need to be closed because it is useless.

originalText.text:
They were good back then when the older guys were in charge, but now its about greed, and does not tend or heed to your needs. You have to cry blood for them to represent you and when they do, you're better off representing your self. They have no respect for departments they should be representing.
Which brings them to lawsuits. Too many lies, excuses, and last moments notice. They don't even know anything about law enforcement but wants to keep them. Smh, worst Union ever.

originalText.text: Equal pay for equal work does not mean anything to Local 237. As a law enforcement officer who is represented by them, they do not return phone calls and do not inform us of any disciplinary changes that are made. They simply say yes to whatever the city or upper management think and sign off on it. We put our lives on the line each time we go into work and  they say they know this but actions speak louder than words.... Go LEEBA!

originalText.text: They represent both management and the workers. They say it's a brother sister relationship but really work for management. More of mediator between supervision and the workers than an actual union. Never seem to have the power to do anything.

text.text: They represent both management and the workers. They say it's a brother sister relationship but really work for management. More of mediator between supervision and the workers than an actual union. Never seem to have the power to do anything.

originalText.text: One star, because there is no option for none. Absolutely agree with Prisoner60863, and K. Worthless! My husband was just thrown out from his job of 16 years, just because his pay was too much. This union just stood by, and did not move a finger! Legal action, anyone?
